.. _`picard RevertSam`:

PICARD REVERTSAM
================

Reverts SAM or BAM files to a previous state. .






Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule revert_bam:
        input:
            "mapped/{sample}.bam"
        output:
            "revert/{sample}.bam"
        log:
            "logs/picard/revert_sam/{sample}.log"
        params:
            extra="SANITIZE=true" # optional: Extra arguments for picard.
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/picard/revertsam"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
